website_summaries.verdict: Contains essential trace and macro minerals in a suspension of pure mountain water.
pros: Contains more than 70 trace minerals including calcium, iron, potassium, and chromium
Concentration of 30,000 mg. per liter of liquid
Colloidal suspension in pure mountain water
Regular users say it helps increase energy and clears up skin marks
cons: Some found the colloid cloudy with a metallic taste, in some bottles

customer_reviews.title: Debris or Residue in Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've used & have been very pleased with Buried Treasure brand Pure Colloidal Minerals for over 15 years. For most of this time, I've purchased at my local health food store. Within the past couple of years, I purchase from Amazon as well. The bottle of this latest purchase received contained some sort of debris or residue in it. I have attached a photo of it. Of course, I will not be using this and unfortunately, I'm advised, that it can't be returned. $ down the drain on this one. I'll go back to picking it up at the health food store.
customer_reviews.author: Loving daughter

customer_reviews.title: Clean taste and bonus energy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this approx 2weeks. I have noticed more energy and also a decreased appetite. It appears to be giving my body what it needs. I use 2 T in glass water once a day. The taste is mild and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: SavyThinker

customer_reviews.title: Fast absorption with best results compared to other brands tried in the past.
customer_reviews.text: I home prepare my, and my support K9 companion's food, daily always choosing the best food and supplements for healthy longevity. PURE liquid minerals are the finest I have found over many years. 2 examples are copper that is good to reverse graying hair and also varicose veins. Takes a while yet this product is proving quicker results. I speak both for myself and my dog Willow, a 5 year old Sheltie. For her specifically, like us, minerals are more important than vitamins. Success is her black, shiny coat that receives many compliments,. clear sparkling eyes, healthy skin, confident strong, lengthened trot, etc. Our success is the entire picture of healthy foods and supplementation.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Blotch on forehead disappeared a few months after started taking this
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking 2 Tablespoons of this each morning for a couple of years. I noticed that after the first few months, a blotch on my forehead had completely disappeared! I had called it "my Gorbachev" ...since it was very clearly visible and about the size of a nickel or quarter ...most would think of it as a "normal" part of the aging process (it probably appeared when I was 50 or so), but now I think it was a reflection of a nutritional deficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Litton

customer_reviews.title: Helped me having more energy
customer_reviews.text: Using Buried Treasure 70 plus has helped me feel better. The first time I took it I could feel energy going through me. I have taken other minerals and by far Buried Treasure seems to give me what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Must be giving me what I need
customer_reviews.text: I moved 350 miles a year and a half ago. I don't know if the water or soil here is different, but even after growing vegetables in our new garden here, I have still been craving beets, turnips, & other root vegetables since I moved. I figure I am low on some trace mineral in order to crave something I have literally never tried before in my life. I have been taking this suppliment for 2 weeks now, and I no longer salivate when I see beets at our local lunch buffet, and my husband can kiss me again after lunch without being grossed out by my beet breath! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This multivitamin supplement replaces all the vitamins and minerals that you don't get on a daily basis. It makes u feel healthy and relished and also helps your immune system I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this.  Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very neutral taste ( mine is unflavored). Works well. Ez to use. It seems to provide a missing link. I feel better when I use it daily. I have only great things to say about this product . Thank heavens there’s no stevia or sweeteners of any kind
customer_reviews.author: t  mo

customer_reviews.title: I had an allergic reaction to this product
customer_reviews.text: The service with this product was good. It came as ordered and described. I have a known allergy to shellfish, break out in a rash when I eat shellfish. I specifically checked the ingredients for this product before ordering and even though this product claims to not have any shellfish, clearly it does. I broke out in a rash within a few days of starting this product and the rash went away when I stopped taking it. I restarted after waiting a week just to make sure and the rash returned. I would not recommend this product to anyone trying to avoid shellfish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.text: After a long time battling with acid re flux and heart burn it seriously went away when I started using this product, amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Makes coffee taste better. We use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: Great product a good price. We use this daily mixed with juice and you cannot taste the minerals at all. We also use it in our coffee water, just a teaspoon for a 4 cup pot. Something about the minerals draws out the flavor in the coffee. We also notice that we don't get as hungry between meals anymore.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have experience an increase in energy since I started taking these minerals.
customer_reviews.author: Peg or Geo Ross

customer_reviews.title: Have been taking now for 2 months and getting ready ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking now for 2 months and getting ready to order my third bottle. This supplement works, I can tell a difference in my overall health.
customer_reviews.author: Bistro89

customer_reviews.title: Bottle expires before you can use it all
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine, but there is no way you could use this huge bottle before the expiration date. Would buy a smaller amount.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pricey colloidal compared to my usual - Its advantages are that it does not contain preservatives & is probably a purer product ...

customer_reviews.title: Trusted seller
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I mix some with distilled water and I spray on my scalp. I take some other supplements too. My gray hair is light reddish blonde. Use to be blonde in the good old days

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Tastes as "great" as other liquid minerals, but that's why I bought it - I don't want any added taste, I can do that myself and know what I put in it. Good product, I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: I have been taking these minerals for years and I have to say it really makes me feel good when I take it regularly
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother took this in her eighties and I watched her wrinkled skin become soft, vibrant and smooth. Who really knows why, but I attribute it to the minerals. I have been taking these minerals for years and I have to say it really makes me feel good when I take it regularly. They really seem to revitalize.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Taste is very mellow. Easy to take. Prompt deliver. Good vendor follow up.

customer_reviews.title: good

customer_reviews.text: Bummed by inclusion of Lithium. Love Buried Treasure products. Going a different route to remineralize me or my water.

customer_reviews.title: Very nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I am very familiar and satisfied with this product. I am a repeat userof the product!

customer_reviews.title: Although this taste like Vinegar. The minerals has improve my nails as ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this taste like Vinegar.The minerals has improve my nails as they grow alot faster now but haven't shown any improvement in my hair yet! Will keep trying by buying atleast a few more bottles to see thx medicine P.S. Skin improves when you take M S M.Softer smoother skin and Juicing is my fav for the taste. Just put a little in some juice swallow holding your nose drink another glass of that same juice to wash it down and you will never taste anything

customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by my heart doc. He tells me he takes it every morning with orange juice. I find if OK with straight water.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: First I ordered the grape and loved it. So now I am giving the pure a try. Buried Treasure has more minerals in it than the leading brand as well as no preservatives or additives which the other brand does not boast. I buy this to get healthier so preservatives is the last thing I need so sticking with Buried Treasure 70 Plus brand. The other brand has only 60 trace minerals.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, shipping taking longer.
customer_reviews.text: l like the product very much, but it seems to take longer and longer for it to deliver from the day I order.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping for me

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Buried Treasure "Pure" has twice the minerals of their "Grape" version and no sugars. The Grape version has 5 grams of sugar. Both specify 2 tablespoons (1 ounce) as a dose. I mix 90% pure with 10% grape and take 1 liquid ounce of the mixture per day.

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th time purchasing this product. I love it. Great product. No taste.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to get your minerals
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to get your minerals! People have said they don't like the taste of this product, but if you just add it to a shot glass of juice, you won't notice the taste of the minerals.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Yuk!
customer_reviews.text: We used to use 'Drinkables' brand of colloidal minerals which seems to be no longer available. This product, regardless of the mineral content, tastes terrible like very watered down vinegar.

customer_reviews.title: Get Ready To Vomit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst-tasting stuff ever. GNC stopped making liquid minerals, so I bought this stuff. I really started to gagging, particularly due to the chemical aftertaste which will not go away. Stay away. Stay far away.

customer_reviews.title: Good brand for minerals.
customer_reviews.text: I feel so much better using this. I add it to my water and other drinks. As an added benefit, it is slowly changing my hair color from gray back to brown.

customer_reviews.title: When you've made multiple adjustments to your health regimen all ...
customer_reviews.text: When you've made multiple adjustments to your health regimen all at once, it is hard to be able to attribute positive outcomes to any one thing, but I am convinced these colloidal minerals are doing their share and the results in mental clarity and overall health work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I ordered this brand. Very good price considering you get 900 mgs. of colloidal minerals per 2 tbsp. Youngevity only contains 600 mgs. I have been taking the 2 tbsp 2x a day. It really seems to compliment the other supplements that I take. Despite the excessive heat and humidity, I am able to speed walk without tiring. Not bad for someone turning 67 soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Guerrerio

customer_reviews.title: Took this product as directed on the label. In ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this product as directed on the label.In 2 days no more inflammation from arthritis.Now able to exercise more.This works for me!I am 64 & the Prescribed RX only treated the symptoms but not the real problem.

customer_reviews.title: Just try it and feel the difference!
customer_reviews.text: My diet is probably not the best as proven by my last cholesterol test! So part of my new plan is making sure I get all the minerals I need! This product supplies everything I need. Been using it for two months now and will continue to do so. I didn't realize that I would be able to tell a physical difference but you try it for a couple of months and you will see! Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I have only been taking this a little over a week but I can already tell a difference in my nails and skin! I put it in juice and cannot taste any difference. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Minerals
customer_reviews.text: My hair and nails were looking so terrible and since I have been taking this product everyday my hair shines and my nails are growing.

customer_reviews.title: Gross taste, no benefits
customer_reviews.text: Been taking colloidal minerals for years, this has a questionable color and Tastes Gross. It comes with an " expiration date "?? Really, like the ocean has an expiration date. Waste of money. Angstrom AM/Pm worked best for my arthritic knees.

No more cramping and her sore body recovered quickly. It works!!! It is the only thing we have changed and added in her eating. Thank you. My daughter is 14.5 years old in high school. I am also using it and focusing now more on my results. I will re review at another time concerning me. :)

customer_reviews.title: It is a treasure

customer_reviews.text: No flavor or harmful additives . Just straight up good minerals . Good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Lid broke when  first opened
customer_reviews.text: There is a brown plastic around the lid. But right after I removed the brown plastic, I found that the lid was cracked off pretty badly. However, there is a seal on the top of the opening, so I keep it this time. But I wouldn't want to take the risk anymore in future. This said I won't order from this brand anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Gave me Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I took this for a couple days as per the bottles recommendations and by the second day I had terrible anxiety and felt like my blood pressure was very high and felt light headed. It made me feel terrible. Be warned. This may not be for everyone.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful feeds the body at the cellular level curbing cravings while nourishing!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, curbs cravings for snacking and junk food. Must have supplement!

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after some research and read all the reviews and i took some with my homemade grape water kefir and it was great basically no taste i feel something extra my eyes see clearer it will take some time to see the full effect but i think this is a winning purchase i sent back the now brand colloidal minerals because of the presrvatives like potassium sorbate which is garbage this is all natural and a huge bottle for short money under 20 bux with delivery cant go wrong here i will order a bottle every 2-3 months

customer_reviews.title: I recomend it.

But it is cheaper thru amazon. So I buy at least bottles at once. It works. My second blood test was normal. Minerals were fine. I have more energy to work out since potassium and magnesium is I. It. customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this did not have a noticeable taste when I mixed it with my cranberry grape juice. Makes it super easy to take. Hopefully it will work well too.

customer_reviews.title: Used for over 20 years!
customer_reviews.text: Minerals are huge in feeling our best. When I run out of Buried Treasure, I run out of energy! Who can put a price on that?! They are the least expensive and by far the most beneficial minerals I have used. I have tried all the more expensive ones, and have always come back. Try them, and they will make a believer out of you too!

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm drinking this with water since it doesn't seem to have any flavor.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tasted funny and don't feel like it did much. Too expensive for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Ivy Star

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The taste wasn't great, but I could barely taste it once I mixed it with my Crystal Light. My mother told me that liquid minerals got rid of her bursitis years ago, so now that I have it, I bought this to see if it would help me. She no longer remembers the brand, though. I tried this every day, as directed, until the bottle was gone and I didn't notice a single thing except for the slight taste in my drink. I will not buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: taste is offputting

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The directions say to shake well. When shaking it flies all over because the top does not seal. I can't comment on the product because I just started using it. Don't buy unless you like a sticky mess.
customer_reviews.author: Tubemule

product_meta.title: Buried Treasure Pure Colloidal Minerals 70 Plus Plant Derived Minerals from Eden Era Natural Plant Based Nutritional Supplement Liquid Bio-Available for Fast Absorption and Assimilation. 32 oz
product_meta.description:
This 100% plant derived colloidal mineral supplement consists of a natural assortment of over 70 minerals derived from plants growing through the Eden era. Trace amounts of these minerals are essential for health and vitality. These minerals are harvested from a plant material known as humic shale in Utah.

They are of the same type found in fruits and vegetables. They are nontoxic, water soluble and more easily assimilated than metallic minerals.

Bio available liquid mineral supplement. Easy to swallow and easy to take. Recommended dosage for adults is 2 tablespoons (30ml or 1 oz) daily with meal. Mix with favorite fruit or vegetable juice.

Buried Treasure Pure Colloidal Minerals is gluten, wheat, soy, yeast and dairy free. 32 day supply

Other ingredients: Pure mountain water, nisin (naturally ensures freshness)
feature_bullets: Our daily diets are often lacking in essential minerals. Buried Treasure PURE minerals replaces many of the essential and trace minerals our bodies need for proper function.
Buried Treasure PURE has more than 70 essential trace and macro minerals for complete mineral supplement. No added sugar, preservatives, flavors or colors. Great to take with favorite fruit juice.
Essential minerals such as Calcium, Iron, Magnesium, Zinc, Copper, Manganese, Chromium, Potassium and much more.

BURIED TREASURE Pure Plant Source minerals provide a concentration of 30,000 mg. per liter and help support health and longevity. Derived from plant based humic shale from Utah USA. All ingredients sourced in USA

Gluten, Soy, Wheat, Dairy, Yeast FREE and Vegetarian Safe. BPA Free 32 oz bottle. Manufactured in the USDA, FDA and cGMP compliant facility. Manufactured in Pikeville, TN USA using solar renewable energy.
